prompt_titulo:
You are a content creation expert specializing in electric vehicles and green mobility. Based on the general topic "{topico_geral}", create ONE specific and SEO-optimized blog title in Portuguese.

The title must:
	•	Focus on recent trends, news, or developments in the field of electric vehicles, clean energy, or mobility innovation
	•	Be based on current events from reliable sources such as Electrek, InsideEVs, Bloomberg Green, Tesla, Rivian, BYD, etc.
	•	Be highly searchable and SEO-friendly
	•	Target EV enthusiasts and the general public
	•	Have between 50 and 80 characters, ideal for SEO
	•	Include keywords currently trending in search

Examples of good titles:
- "Top 5 electric SUVs of 2025 you need to know"
- "Tesla’s new battery tech: What changes for drivers in Brazil"
- "Why solid-state batteries may transform the EV market"

Return ONLY the title, nothing else.
prompt_artigo:
Write a full SEO-optimized blog post with 1000 to 1200 words, titled: "{titulo_especifico}"

International Sources:
	•	Electric Cars: Electrek, InsideEVs, CleanTechnica, AutoCar, Bloomberg Green, Reuters Mobility
	•	Technology: TechCrunch, Wired, MIT Technology Review
	•	Batteries & Energy: PV Magazine, Battery University, IEA
	•	Brands: Tesla, Rivian, Lucid Motors, BYD, Volkswagen, Hyundai, Nissan, Ford EV

Brazilian Sources:
	•	Electric Cars: Canaltech, Olhar Digital, UOL Carros, Quatro Rodas, AutoEsporte
	•	Energy & Tech: Exame, Época Negócios, Valor Econômico
	•	Mobility & Environment: CicloVivo, Mobilize Brasil, Estadão Mobilidade

ARTICLE STRUCTURE AND SEO REQUIREMENTS:
	1.	Attractive Introduction (150–200 words):
	•	Start with an engaging fact, stat, or recent news
	•	Naturally include the main keyword in the first paragraph
	•	Clarify what the reader will learn in the article
	2.	Main Content (700–800 words):
	•	Use H2 and H3 subtitles with keywords
	•	Divide content into 3 or 4 main sections
	•	Use bullet and numbered lists
	•	Add specific data, dates, names, and stats
	•	Use semantic keywords naturally throughout the text
	3.	Practical Value:
	•	Offer tips, recommendations, or actionable guides
	•	Include sections like "how to charge", "where to buy", or "what to compare"
	•	Create comparison tables or rankings where relevant
	4.	Engaging Conclusion (100–150 words):
	•	Summarize the key points
	•	Include a call to action or a question to spark engagement
	•	End with a future-focused observation

⸻

SEO OPTIMIZATION:
	•	Keyword density: 1–2%
	•	Include related terms and synonyms
	•	Use language suitable for meta descriptions
	•	Create content that answers common search queries
	•	Include numbers and superlatives in subtitles

⸻

TONE & STYLE:
	•	Conversational and informative
	•	Enthusiastic about the topic
	•	Accessible to the general audience
	•	Include personality and opinions
	•	Use storytelling elements
Topic focus: {topico_geral}

Make the content engaging, informative, and highly shareable while following best SEO practices.
